amendment.description: Amendment sought to provide litigants in a pending class action access to information held in a trust that is directly related to a plaintiff's claim for asbestos exposure.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 9 printed in House Report 114-389 to provide litigants in a pending class action access to information held in a trust that is directly related to a plaintiff's claim for asbestos exposure.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 228 (Roll no. 30).

action.text: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
